description.value: Immediately after you use your Smash talent with a melee attack that is not an unarmed strike and break the weapon, you can use a bonus action to make an additional attack using the destroyed pieces of the weapon. The pieces are an improvised weapon that deal 1d4 damage and are destroyed after the attack.
description.chat: The pieces of the improvised weapon dealds [[1d4[piercing]]] damage and are destroyed after the attack.

activation.condition: Immediately after you use your Smash talent with a melee attack that is not an unarmed strike and break the weapon.
